name: ew-rate-limiter
description: Akamai Edgeworker that will do a call to rate-limiter
author: jgrinwis@akamai.com

config.description: call rate limit and check response

scripts.build-bundle-json: cd built && echo '{"edgeworker-version":"'$npm_package_version'","description":"'$npm_package_config_description'"}'> bundle.json && npm run build-ew-tgz
scripts.build-ew-tgz: cd built && tar czvf ../dist/'ew_'$npm_package_config_ewid'_'$npm_package_version'.tgz' * && npm run activate-edgeworker
scripts.activate-edgeworker: npm run upload-edgeworker && akamai edgeworkers --section $npm_package_config_edgerc_section  activate $npm_package_config_ewid staging $npm_package_version
